data.lyric:
[ti:Heaven]
[ar:Kane Brown]

[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heaven - Kane Brown
[00:06.25]Written by：Shy Carter/Matt McGinn/Lindsay Rimes
[00:12.51]This is perfect
[00:14.19]
[00:15.53]Come kiss me one more time
[00:18.33]I couldn't dream this up
[00:21.00]
[00:21.78]Even if I tried
[00:24.05]
[00:24.89]You and me in this moment
[00:27.90]Feels like magic only
[00:30.95]I'm right where I wanna be
[00:35.69]
[00:37.54]Everybody's talking about heaven like
[00:39.73]They just can't wait to go
[00:41.94]
[00:43.55]Saying how it's gonna be so good so beautiful
[00:47.95]
[00:49.24]Lying next to you in this bed with you
[00:52.32]I ain't convinced
[00:54.34]Cause I don't know how
[00:56.79]I don't know how heaven heaven
[00:59.82]Could be better than this
[01:02.13]

[01:08.01]
